channel.title: Telegram on dk
channel.description: Recent content in Telegram on dk

item.title: Grey Zone eliminated in Mali together with Russian mercenaries and the FAMa
item.description: At the end of July 2024, a military convoy of the Malian Armed Forces (FAMa) supported by Russian mercenaries from Africa Corps (formerly Wagner) was eliminated near the town of Tinzaouatine in northern Mali by fighters from the Strategic Framework for the Defence of the People of Azawad (CSP-DPA).
